list.name: Default
list.comment: Get rid of the build directory.

option.value: XQuery Main Module

option.name: description
option.value: Deletes all documents in the content database; requires -Pconfirm=true to be set so this isn't accidentally executed

option.name: description
option.value: Displays the sub-projects of root project 'roxyUnitTest'.

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy each certificate authority, updating it if it exists, in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Restart the local cluster

option.name: description
option.value: Downloads (if necessary) and unzips in the build directory all mlRestApi dependencies

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy each protected path, updating it if it exists, in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Merge the database named by mlAppConfig.contentDatabaseName

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy each query roleset, updating it if it exists, in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Merge the database named by the project property dbName; e.g. gradle mlMergeDatabase -PdbName=my-database

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles a jar archive containing the main classes.

option.name: description
option.value: Export batches of documents to files in a directory. Run with -PjobProperties (no value needed) for more information.

option.name: description
option.value: Displays the configuration model of root project 'roxyUnitTest'. [incubating]

option.name: description
option.value: Delete all Flexrep configs and their associated targets

option.name: description
option.value: Clears the modules database and then deploys the application

option.value: Processes main resources.

option.value: Displays the tasks runnable from root project 'roxyUnitTest'.

option.name: description
option.value: Loads modules from directories defined by mlAppConfig or via a property on this task

option.name: description
option.value: Initializes a new Gradle build.

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy each database, updating it if it exists, in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy each certificate template, updating it if it exists, in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Deprecated - delete forest replicas via the command.forestNamesAndReplicaCounts map

option.name: description
option.value: Export workspaces from qconsole

option.name: description
option.value: Remove a host from the cluster; must define 'host' property

option.name: description
option.value: Add permissions to documents. Run with -PjobProperties (no value needed) for more information.

option.name: description
option.value: Displays all dependencies declared in root project 'roxyUnitTest'.

option.name: description
option.value: Processes test resources.

option.name: description
option.value: Undeploy (delete) each amp in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Generate project scaffold for a new project

option.name: description
option.value: Create a new resource extension in the modules services directory; use -PresourceName and -PresourceType to set the resource name and type (either xqy or sjs)

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles and tests this project and all projects it depends on.

option.name: description
option.value: Disable SSL FIPS across the cluster

option.name: description
option.value: Delete collections. Run with -PjobProperties (no value needed) for more information.

option.name: description
option.value: Print the customTokens map on the mlAppConfig object (typically for debugging purposes)

option.name: description
option.value: Run a loop that checks for new/modified modules every second and loads any that it finds. To ignore files that are already dirty and only process new changes, include -PignoreDirty=true .

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy external security configurations, updating each if it exists, in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Displays the components produced by root project 'roxyUnitTest'. [incubating]

option.name: description
option.value: Undeploys all application resources in the configuration directory and allows for additional steps via mlPostUndeploy.dependsOn; requires -Pconfirm=true to be set so this isn't accidentally executed

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy each alerting resource - configs, actions, and rules - in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy each mimetype, updating it if it exists, in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Generate a marklogic-unit-test test suite. The test suite files are written to src/test/ml-modules/root/test/suites by default; use -PsuitesPath to override this. Can use -PsuiteName to override the name of the test suite, and -PtestName to override the name of the test module.

option.name: description
option.value: Modify the properties of the local cluster based on the ml-config/clusters/local-cluster.json file

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles test classes.

option.name: description
option.value: Undeploy (delete) each protected path in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Generates Javadoc API documentation for the main source code.

option.name: description
option.value: Disable every target on every flexrep config

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy each privilege, updating it if it exists, in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Load default pipelines into a triggers database

option.name: description
option.value: Sets updated-allowed on each primary forest for the content database; must set the mode via e.g. -Pmode=flash-backup

option.name: description
option.value: Perform a one-time initialization of a MarkLogic server; uses the properties 'mlLicenseKey' and 'mlLicensee'

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy each trigger, updating it if it exists, in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Generate a new server resource file. Non-complex properties can be specified via -Pml-(name of property).

option.name: description
option.value: Migrate build steps from deploy/app_specific.rb into custom Gradle tasks. Use -ProxyProjectPath to define the location of your Roxy project, and -PappSpecificPath to define a path other than deploy/app_specific.rb

option.name: description
option.value: Undeploy (delete) each scheduled task in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Generate a new amp resource file. Non-complex properties can be specified via -Pml-(name of property).

option.name: description
option.value: Undeploy (delete) each role in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Displays the insight into a specific dependency in root project 'roxyUnitTest'.

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy temporal configuration. Note that (currently) you can't update the temporal configuration (collection properties and LSQT properties excepted)

option.name: description
option.value: Wait for the task server to not have any requests in progress

option.name: description
option.value: Assembles the outputs of this project.

option.name: description
option.value: Export documents to a single file. Run with -PjobProperties (no value needed) for more information.

option.name: description
option.value: Displays a help message.

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy each SQL view schema, updating it if it exists, in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Enable each scheduled task in the group identified by the mlGroupName property, which defaults to 'Default'

option.name: description
option.value: Undeploy each mimetype defined in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Run tests found under /test/suites in the modules database. Connects to MarkLogic via the REST API server defined by mlTestRestPort (or by mlRestPort if mlTestRestPort is not set), and uses mlRest* properties for authentication. Use -PunitTestResultPath to override where test result files are written, which defaults to build/test-results/marklogic-unit-test. Use -PrunTeardown and -PrunSuiteTeardown to control whether teardown and suite teardown scripts are run; these default to 'true' and can be set to 'false' instead.

option.name: description
option.value: Reindex the database named by mlAppConfig.contentDatabaseName

option.name: description
option.value: Clears schemas database then loads special-purpose data into the schemas database (XSD schemas, Inference rules, and [MarkLogic 9] Extraction Templates)

option.name: description
option.value: Generate a new external security resource file. Non-complex properties can be specified via -Pml-(name of property).

option.name: description
option.value: Undeploy (delete) all security resources in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Set permissions on documents. Run with -PjobProperties (no value needed) for more information.

option.name: description
option.value: Deletes all documents in the triggers database

option.name: description
option.value: Deletes potentially all of the documents in the modules database; has a property for excluding documents from deletion

option.name: description
option.value: Export modules matching a URI pattern of ** (can be overridden via -PuriPattern) from the database defined by mlModulesDatabaseName (can be overridden via -PdatabaseName) to the last path defined by mlModulePaths (can be overridden via -PexportPath). For each module that cannot be exported, an error will be logged; an error will be thrown instead by setting -PlogErrors to false.

option.name: description
option.value: Generates Gradle wrapper files.

option.name: description
option.value: Undeploy (delete) each user in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Delete any non-REST API servers (e.g. ODBC and XBC servers) defined by server files in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Generate a new privilege resource file. Non-complex properties can be specified via -Pml-(name of property).

option.name: description
option.value: Add host to the cluster; must define 'host', 'hostGroup' (optional), and 'hostZone' (optional) properties

option.name: description
option.value: Delete all scheduled tasks in the cluster

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy custom forests as defined in subdirectories of the forests configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Perform a one-time installation of an admin user; uses the properties 'mlAdminUsername'/'mlUsername' and 'mlAdminPassword'/'mlPassword'

option.name: description
option.value: Export documents to a single zip. Run with -PjobProperties (no value needed) for more information.

option.name: description
option.value: Remove collections from documents. Run with -PjobProperties (no value needed) for more information.

option.name: description
option.value: Remove permissions from documents. Run with -PjobProperties (no value needed) for more information.

option.name: description
option.value: Export resources based on a properties file specified via -PpropertiesFile, -Pprefix, or -Pregex; use -PincludeTypes to select resource types to export via a comma-delimited string; use -PexportPath to specify where to export resources to

option.name: description
option.value: Deploy each role, updating it if it exists, in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Clears the triggers database and then calls mlDeployCpf; be sure to reload custom triggers after doing this, as they will be deleted as well

option.name: description
option.value: Undeploy (delete) each external security configuration in the configuration directory

option.name: description
option.value: Add dependsOn to this task to add tasks at the end of mlDeploy

option.name: description
option.value: Print all of the properties supported by ml-gradle

option.value: Runs the unit tests.

option.value: Deploy all Flexrep resources in a directory under ml-config/flexrep with a name matching the property mlFlexrepPath

option.value: Undeploy (delete) each privilege in the configuration directory

option.value: Assign each specified host to its corresponding group, as defined by the mlHostGroups property

option.name: description
option.value: Deploys all application resources in the configuration directory and allows for additional steps via mlPostDeploy.dependsOn. Use -Pignore to specify a comma-delimited list of short class names of ml-app-deployer command classes to ignore while deploying.

option.name: description
option.value: Compiles main Java source.

option.value: Generate a new database resource file. Non-complex properties can be specified via -Pml-(name of property).

option.value: Delete all alert configs, which also deletes all of the actions rules associated with them

option.value: Delete the properties file in the build directory that keeps track of when each module was last loaded

option.value: Set trace events via a comma-delimited string - e.g. -Pevents=event1,event2
